attributes.action: to change the rigid,  longwinded , adversarial Complaints and Contracts  system  of Health Service into Case Study
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This would return  Chief Executives, not their PAs to being personally contactable not bought in once in a blue moon  . They would not be on   remits and procedures. They would be   responsible to and monitored by  the Doctors to   whom    funding would be restored  , not   allowing  the restrictions  by  PCT/SHA/LA  accountants  who employ the GPs and others on contract part time . So that those with  chronic long term  conditions  would not be sent back to square one each time  .

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
